page.title: 09Home on a Farm
page.content: My home is a farm.Our farm is a dairy farm.We have four milkers.We milk our cows by hand.I milk one cow called Maisy. We have also got chickens,ducks and a jackdaw called Jack.Each member of my family has a dog,mine is called Nipper.My sister has a pony.We have three neighbours and they are all farmers.One of our neighbours has more than a hundred cows on his farm.He milks them with the milking machine.We are all very friendly and visit each other frequently.We help each other out whenever we can.I enjoy living on a farm.
